Text: Looks like a good collection, but needs some seeders.
I know you worked on this forever... You had to of. Anyway, I appreciate your work. thanks again.

I just wanna say a HUUUUUGE ty to you keikii. This is an exceptional download. Even authors i wouldn't expect to see are here, it's crazy!!. maybe when the more recent books come out you'll have them, least i hope. Even if you don't, still, you saved me a LOT of time. ty!
Wow this is amazing! i made an account on TPB just to tell you that, thanks!

Hi Keikii,

Great job!!!

I downloaded the torrent, they all came as a .rar file.  Which isn't a big deal because I can convert them but I didn't get all the books.  (I don't think).  For example:  Stephanie Meyer has the 4 books but I only got Twilight.  Do you know if I did something wrong?  Also your guide that is so helpful - I don't see it on the download.  Anyway, if you can help me out that would be great.

Thanks again for doing all of this, I have no idea where you found all the books.

Thanks
K
I just got so excited seeing this! Ahh! Thank you so much, I can't wait for this torrent to download. I'll seed as long as possible when it's done!
